embeddedItem.name: Key of Inspiration
embeddedItem.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the Meditative Scholars. Used to level up Traces slightly for Erudition characters.
embeddedItem.lore:
It can unlock inspirations hidden deep within the conscience.
To take hold of the key is to grasp at the darting embers of thought that lead to the forward path.

"Eureka!"

39350.name: Today Is Another Peaceful Day
39350.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
39350.lore:
There is the new book borrowed for lunch and she just figured out a new way to play tiles.
If she works slowly, the rest of her job should last exactly till the end of day.
She ducks easily into a corner.

No one must disturb her in her wonderful off time
— not even diviner Fu.
Just on the off chance that she does show up...

"Then I'll give this milk candy ball to Diviner Fu. She can't be angry after having sweets!"

79829.name: Night on the Milky Way
79829.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79829.lore:
If you are concerned for the road, just look up again.
When the stars look gently down, the heart would already be soaring.
Every thought and every whisper,
becomes a life experience that would never leave.

196474.name: Before Dawn
196474.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
196474.lore:
"Do not make this decision lightly, general... Think about how you will be remembered in history..."
The general of the Cloud Knights listens to his subordinates' words with eyes half-closed.
"History will make its own judgment, but I have no interest in my legacy."
"If I succeed, history will state that I am currently supremely confident in my masterful strategy."
"But if I fail, then history will state that I am currently neglecting my duties in wanton pleasure, preferring finches over my people."

A finch jumps down from his shoulder, and he extends his hand to catch the small creature.
"I have simply made my own decision."

215955.name: Jing Yuan
215955.lore:
The Divine Foresight, one of the Seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance, leads the Cloud Knights of the Xianzhou Luofu.
A student of the Luofu's previous Sword Champion, though not known for his martial prowess.

376066.name: Himeko
376066.lore:
The one who repaired the Astral Express.
To witness the vast starry sky, she decided to travel with the Astral Express.
Her hobby is brewing hand-made coffee.

376067.name: Herta
376067.lore:
Member 83 of the Genius Society. The real master of the space station.
An incredibly intelligent yet unsympathetic scientist.

500482.name: Qingque
500482.lore:
Diviner of the Divination Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu, and a librarian.
Always slacks off and is about to be demoted to a "door guardian."

538567.name: Serval
538567.lore:
A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects.
As Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's.
She loves an ancient form of music known as "rock 'n' roll" that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.

676264.name: Passkey
676264.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676264.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Knowledge is locked behind a gate, the key to which is hidden from those seeking answers from others, while made obvious for those determined to find it on their own."

754821.name: The Birth of the Self
754821.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754821.lore:
In the beginning, it had the exact same pose as the previous portrait.
Looking at the face identical to hers, she was convinced that this was not her.

"Impossible. How can two portraits be exactly the same?"

She tweaked its joints, opened its eyes, and made its fingers softer.
She looked happy when all the changes were done.

"Completely different from yesterday. This is more like who I am today."

792906.name: Data Bank
792906.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792906.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Human extinction is inevitable, but the library will live on: lonely, immobile, and hidden from the public. Its vast collection is useless, yet pure from corruption."

838765.name: Make the World Clamor
838765.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838765.lore:
She stood on the stage, waving at her audience, encouraging them to make their voice heard.
Songs, shouting, or sigh — anything that makes a sound.
Voice your thoughts, so others can come to help.

"Don't make your heart as cold as this concrete jungle."

— Make the world clamor.

955406.name: The Seriousness of Breakfast
955406.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955406.lore:
Though the table is set...
Some people want a cup of tea first.
Some people want to take a picture first.
Some people want to read the newspaper first.
Some people want to write a page in their notebook first.
Some people want to play on their phone first.

"All of you, eat while the food is hot!"

955413.name: Geniuses' Repose
955413.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955413.lore:
She pointed at that green rice cake.
"The experiment has ended. Time to take a break. I just can't miss this freshly made dessert."

She saw the puppet girl frowning in deep thought.
"Well, in your current body, you can only look but not eat. I'll make you a box of new ones when the time comes."

She saw the mechanical aristocrat hesitating at his own cup.
"Don't worry. It's only machine oil. Perfectly safe for you to consume."

993498.name: Sagacity
993498.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
993498.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Should Wise Ones be unable to abandon their identity as humans, they shall be abandoned by wisdom."
